pysetup.structure_parser.build_base(structure: dict) → None[source]
Builds the following:

  • .gitignore file;

  • LICENSE file;

  • pyproject.toml file;

  • README.md file;

  • venv

Parameters:

structure (dict) – The structure of the project retreived from struct.json file.

Raises:

  • RequiredFieldError: Inherited from check_string()

pysetup.structure_parser.create_commit(structure: dict) → None[source]

Generates a custom script which makes tests, generates documentation, commits and pushes all in one NOTE: The file is generated ONLY if the following flags are set to trye in structure.json:

  • “configure_test_folder”

  • “use_sphinx”

  • “configure_git”

  • “configure_github”

Parameters:

structure (dict) – The structure of the project retreived from struct.json file

pysetup.structure_parser.create_venv(structure: dict) → None[source]

Creates a vistual environment and installs dependencies and dev dependencies

Parameters:

structure (dict) – The structure of the project retreived from struct.json file

The structure dictionary

dict

Raises:
